description.@en: Finishing the intonation with ‘ting tang walla walla bing bang!’, you summon forth the Slavering Maw’s barbed tongue to mend believers of their ailments, but at a high price.

effect.@en: Whenever you successfully invoke a Petty Chaos Manifestation, you may heal one person who you can clearly see one step up the Damage Condition Track positively. If it is a Lesser Chaos Manifestation, two people are healed two steps positively. Finally, if it is a Greater Manifestation, three people are healed three steps up the Damage Condition Track positively.
